name: Yvonne
description: Yvonne co-authored the State of DAOs in Taiwan report, bringing deep insights from the Taiwanese Web3 community. She researched a Web3 decentralization project for the Ministry of Digital Affairs, focusing on digital verification and autonomous organizations. Her work spans civil-tech, digital identity, digital art, and DAO ecosystems. Currently studying International Business at National Taiwan University, Yvonne bridges academic knowledge with practical DAO experience.
